behaviour.feedbackOnCorrect: Correct! It can be difficult for translators to only fix certain errors in a segment and avoid over-editing, as this goes against much of their 'traditional' translator training.
behaviour.feedbackOnWrong: Incorrect! It can be difficult for translators to only fix certain errors in a segment and avoid over-editing, as this goes against much of their 'traditional' translator training.

l10n.a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
l10n.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
l10n.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

confirmCheck.body: Are you sure you wish to finish ?

confirmRetry.body: Are you sure you wish to retry ?

question: Light post-editing can often be more challenging for translators than full post-editing.
